children.text: Regain Your Confidence with Thicker, Healthier Hair with QR678 Treatment
Scientifically proven
hair regrowth treatment
with QR678 at The Skin Firm - safe, effective, and
dermatologist-supervised hair restoration
Signs & Concerns QR678 Treatment Can Treat
Thinning Hair & Reduced Density -
noticeable widening of hair parting or scalp visibility
Excessive Hair Fall -
shedding more than 100 strands daily, often seen in androgenetic alopecia
Receding Hairline -
early-stage male and female pattern baldness
Patchy Hair Loss -
localised thinning caused by stress, illness, or hormonal imbalances
Weak & Brittle Hair -
loss of hair strength, breakage, or poor scalp health
Post-pregnancy or Stress-related Hair Loss -
temporary but distressing shedding phases
Hair Loss due tHormonal or Genetic Factors -
including PCOS-related and hereditary conditions
Why Choose QR678 Treatment at The Skin Firm?
At The Skin Firm, we combine medical expertise with compassionate care to deliver the best
hair restoration results in Pune
. Our QR678 treatment is performed under the supervision of Dr. Karishma Singh, renowned Dermatologist in Pune, ensuring every session is
safe, precise, and effective
QR678 hair therapy

is an FDA-approved, scientifically proven therapy that revitalises dormant hair follicles and promotes natural regrowth. Each treatment plan is personalised after a detailed scalp evaluation, making it tailored to your specific concerns.

Trusted by thousands of clients in Pune, we pride ourselves on delivering visible transformations and long-term confidence. From your first consultation to post-treatment guidance, our team is dedicated to supporting you through every step of your hair restoration journey.
How Our QR678 Treatment Works
We assess your hair loss pattern and scalp condition to create a customised treatment plan.
The scalp is cleansed, and a topical anaesthetic may be applied to ensure your comfort.
The growth factor solution is injected into targeted areas of the scalp using fine needles, stimulating follicles and boosting circulation.
Soothing serums are applied post-treatment. You’ll also receive personalised aftercare instructions for the best results.
Types of QR678 Treatment We Offer in Pune
Specially formulated to slow genetic hair thinning and stimulate regrowth.

items.title: QR678 for Stress & Lifestyle-Related Hair Loss

children.text: Addresses shedding caused by stress, poor nutrition, or lifestyle changes, restoring scalp health and hair strength.
A gentle, safe option to manage temporary hair loss after childbirth, helping new mothers regain hair density.

items.title: QR678 for Patchy or Localised Hair Loss

children.text: Effective for alopecia areata and other conditions causing uneven thinning or bald spots.
For those who have completed their initial sessions and want to preserve and enhance their results long-term.
Benefits of QR678 Treatment at The Skin Firm
Stimulates natural hair follicle regeneration

Reduces hair fall from androgenetic alopecia & other causes
Safe, non-surgical, minimally invasive procedure
Gradual, natural-looking hair restoration
Trusted by thousands across India, now available at
one of Pune’s best QR678 clinics
Post-Care After QR678 Treatment
No downtime information available.
Post-Care
Keep the scalp clean and avoid touching or scratching for 24 hours.
Use gentle hair products; avoid harsh chemicals or heat styling for 1-2 days.
Avoid strenuous exercise, swimming, or direct sun exposure for 24-48 hours.
Follow your doctor’s instructions for medications or topical products.
Report any persistent redness, swelling, or signs of infection.

Who Can Benefit from QR678 Treatment?
Men & women experiencing early to moderate hair thinning
Those with androgenetic alopecia (male/female pattern baldness)
Individuals with hair loss due to stress or nutritional deficiencies
Anyone looking for a non-surgical, medically proven solution to restore hair
FAQs About QR678 Hair Therapy

items.question: How is QR678 treatment different from PRP?

children.text: QR678 treatment uses a standardised mix of growth factors designed specifically for hair regrowth, unlike PRP which relies on your own platelets.

items.question: How many sessions will I need?

children.text: Typically, 6-8 sessions spaced 2-4 weeks apart are recommended, followed by maintenance sessions.
Most patients experience minimal discomfort. A numbing cream ensures comfort during injections.
Reduced hair fall can be noticed in about a month, with visible hair growth improvements in 3-4 months.

items.question: Is there downtime after QR678 Treatment?

children.text: Downtime is minimal. Mild redness or swelling may occur but subsides within 24-48 hours.
